channel.title: Pk Point Farming
channel.description: Hi can someone help me out with the pk points? cuz atm you can pk point farm and if someone could help me i would like to know how to make it so if you kill someone you have to wait and kill like 2 other people before you can kill that person again

item.title: Pk Point Farming
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

AtomicInt_:

No you didn’t? You said create a log and check names or use a timer. That and a HashMap are two totally different things.

I was giving a suggestion, in my mindset they seem pretty similar. I don’t know the correct Java terminology or proper ways of usage, sorry.

OP; use a HashMap<String, Integer> to store the values of the killed players after the integer value is above in your case two, remove them from the list so they can receive points from the same player again.[/quote]

@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

@TheWebGuy That is… no not the best way.

OP; use a HashMap<String, Integer> to store the values of the killed players after the integer value is above in your case two, remove them from the list so they can receive points from the same player again.

item.title: Pk Point Farming
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Two methods…

  • Start a timer that saves the playerName, and who they killed, check the timer before killing someone, if it’s more than 5 minutes (meaning they killed that person over 5 minutes ago) then allow them to attack. Otherwise, don’t.

  • Take log of who a player kills, check the temporary log to see how many people it has been since they’ve killed that person.

I’m pretty sure there are tutorials for it. I’d recommend going with the timer method. Otherwise, four people can still do pk point farming in a group, it’ll lessen the chance, but not completely eliminate it.

Read full topic
